name: fair
title: FAIR Data, Workflows, and Research
summary: These lessons will teach you how to make your research objects more FAIR with practical, hands-on advice.

subtopics.title: Make workflows fair with RO-Crate
subtopics.description: This section brought to you by the BY-COVID project, and will teach you how to make your research objects more FAIR with practical, hands-on advice.

materials.title: Submitting workflows to LifeMonitor
questions: How is it useful to me?
key_points: Automation helps us keep workflows re-usable and reproducible.
LifeMonitor helps you monitor and periodically test your workflow.
New workflow releases will automatically be propagated to WorkflowHub, saving you time.
materials.admin_install_yaml:

install_tool_dependencies: true
install_repository_dependencies: true
install_resolver_dependencies: true
tools: []

contributors.name: BeYond-COVID
contributors.funding_statement: BY-COVID is an EC funded project that tackles the data challenges that can hinder effective pandemic response. This project has received funding from the European Union’s Horizon Europe research and innovation programme under grant agreement No. 101046203 (BY-COVID)

materials.title: RO-Crate in Python
questions: What data is contained within an RO-Crate
How can I create an RO-Crate myself?
objectives: Use ORCIDs and other linked data to annotate datasets contained within the crate
key_points: RO-Crates can be created by hand with essentially arbitrary data, using the rocrate python module
However the rocrate command line tool adds several commands to make it easier to automatically generate crates based on existing folder structures.

materials.title: Exporting Workflow Run RO-Crates from Galaxy
questions: What is a Workflow Run Crate?
How can I export a Galaxy Workflow Run Crate?
objectives: Understanding, viewing and creating Galaxy Workflow Run Crates
key_points: Galaxy Workflow Run Crates help you keep provenance of a workflow run / invocation.
Galaxy Workflow Run Crates give extra context to the standard workflow run export
Galaxy Workflow Run Crates can be exported from the top menu, **User -> Workflow Invocations**.

materials.title: Best practices for workflows in GitHub repositories
objectives: Generate a workflow test using Planemo
Understand how testing can be automated with GitHub Actions
key_points: repo2rocrate lets you easily generate templated out metadata for your workflow
Generating tests is easy and something everyone should do.
